full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS DANG CHOS MED MIN GYI BYAD KHA BZLOG PA'I CHO GA SPU GRI RNO MNGAR ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (CES CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI SGO NAS DBANG PHYUG MTSUN LHA'I BYAD KHA DANG, BAN BON GYI BYAD KHA SOGS BZLOG PA'I TSIG SPU GRI'I RNO MNGAR ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI JANG JANG CHEN PO CHEN PO WANG GI SHOG GI ,BLO RIG @007A *, ,DANG LDAN PA HUR TSA PI LIG THU CHOS RJE BKRA SHIS NYI MA DANG, PA THAR DZA SAG GI SHOG GI AER KHE SHI TAR HUNG THA' CI GNYIS KYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, SKYABS GNAS DAM PA DZA YA PAndI TA BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA RNAMS KYI THA SHAL BA, BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING 'CHANG BAS SUG GIS BRIS SO, ,DAD PA MED CING LOG LTA CAN RNAMS LA MI MTHONG BAR BYA'O, ,)
